trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element that can produce the sending and receiving channels required for a reliable session between endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 表示绑定元素，该绑定元素可生成终结点间可靠会话所需的发送和接收通道。

trans-unit.source: Provides sessions and optionally provides ordered message delivery.
trans-unit.target: 提供会话并选择提供有序消息传递。

trans-unit.source: This implemented session can cross SOAP and transport intermediaries.
trans-unit.target: 这个已实现的会话可通过 SOAP 和传输中介。

trans-unit.source: Each binding element represents a processing step when sending or receiving messages.
trans-unit.target: 发送或接收消息时，每个绑定元素都表示一个处理步骤。

trans-unit.source: At runtime, binding elements create the channel factories and listeners that are necessary to build outgoing and incoming channel stacks required to send and receive messages.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，绑定元素会创建必要的通道工厂和侦听器，用以生成发送和接收消息所需的传出和传入通道堆栈。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> provides an optional layer in the stack that can establish a reliable session between endpoints and configure the behavior of this session.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> 会在堆栈中提供一个可选层，该可选层可在终结点之间建立可靠会话并配置此会话的行为。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> is provided on the standard bindings in the following table.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> 位于下表所示的标准绑定上。

trans-unit.source: Binding
trans-unit.target: 绑定

trans-unit.source: Default
trans-unit.target: 默认

trans-unit.source: Off
trans-unit.target: Off

trans-unit.source: Off
trans-unit.target: Off

trans-unit.source: On (required)
trans-unit.target: 启用（必需）

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> can be added to any custom binding.
trans-unit.target: 可将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> 添加到任何自定义绑定。

trans-unit.source: This is done using the following configuration elements.
trans-unit.target: 使用下列配置元素即可完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: The following sample code demonstrates how to use <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> in code.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何在代码中使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if messages must be delivered in the order in which they are sent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息必须按照发送时的顺序传递，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement" /> class that specifies whether message delivery must preserve the order in which messages are sent.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement" /> 类的新实例，用以指定消息传递是否必须保持与消息发送一致的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the interval of time that a destination waits before sending an acknowledgment to the message source on reliable channels that are created by the factory.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在向工厂所创建的可靠通道上的消息源发送确认之前目标等待的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the interval of time that a service waits until sending an acknowledgment to the message source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指定在向消息源发送确认之前服务等待的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 2 seconds.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 2 秒。

trans-unit.source: The destination that receives messages on a reliable channel groups the acknowledgments for these messages together into a single message to reduce network traffic and to increase information density on messages.
trans-unit.target: 从可靠通道上接收消息的目标会将这些消息的确认组合成一条消息，以减少网络流量，同时提高消息的信息密度。

trans-unit.source: Grouping scales better as traffic increases.
trans-unit.target: 这种组合方式具有较好的伸缩性，可应对不断增加的网络流量。

trans-unit.source: It does not attempt to send an acknowledgment for every message it receives as soon as possible, but rather waits for an interval of time, groups together the acknowledgments that have arrived during that interval, and then sends them all together.
trans-unit.target: 它不会尝试一收到消息就尽快发送该消息的确认，而是会等待一段时间，将该间隔期间内到达的确认组合在一起，然后一并发送。

trans-unit.source: The first message that is received is the exception; it is acknowledged as soon as it is delivered.
trans-unit.target: 如果收到的第一条消息是异常消息，则会在消息传出后立即进行确认。

trans-unit.source: Also, if reliable sessions are used with single HTTP connections, as is the case for example with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding> but not <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding>, then this setting is not used.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果通过单个 HTTP 连接来使用可靠会话，例如 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSHttpBinding>，而不是 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding>，则不会使用此设置。

trans-unit.source: The value that is set with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.AcknowledgementInterval%2A> property is a recommendation to the infrastructure and not a hard limit.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.AcknowledgementInterval%2A> 属性设置的值只是提供给基础结构的建议，并不是硬性限制。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the factory builds.
trans-unit.target: 工厂生成的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> that contains the information required to build the factories that can produce channels of type <c>TChannel</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />，包含生成工厂所需的信息，这些工厂可生成类型为 <c>TChannel</c> 的通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns a factory that creates a channel of a specified type that supports a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个工厂，该工厂可创建支持可靠会话的指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" /> initialized from the <paramref name="context" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /><see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" />类型的 <paramref name="context" />（从 中初始化）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel> produced by the factory is of type `TChannel`.
trans-unit.target: 由工厂生成的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel> 具有 `TChannel` 类型。

trans-unit.source: The types of `TChannel` supported on the client is dependent of the types of underlying channels that connect to the service.
trans-unit.target: 客户端上支持的 `TChannel` 类型取决于连接到服务的基础通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates what reliable session channel types are supported as a function of the underlying channels.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出支持何种可靠会话通道类型作为基础通道的一项功能。

trans-unit.source: Support for Reliable Session `TChannel` Types by Underlying Channel Types
trans-unit.target: 基础通道类型支持可靠会话 `TChannel` 类型

trans-unit.source: IRequestChannel
trans-unit.target: IRequestChannel

trans-unit.source: IRequestSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IRequestSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: IDuplexChannel
trans-unit.target: IDuplexChannel

trans-unit.source: IDuplexSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IDuplexSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: IOutputSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IOutputSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: IRequestSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IRequestSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: IDuplexSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IDuplexSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: No
trans-unit.target: 否

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="TChannel" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 <paramref name="TChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" /> that the listener is built to accept.
trans-unit.target: 生成侦听器后所要接受的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> that contains the information required to build the listeners that can accept channels of type <c>TChannel</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />，包含生成侦听器所需的信息，这些侦听器可接受类型为 <c>TChannel</c> 的通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns a listener that accepts a channel of a specified type that supports a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个侦听器，该侦听器可接受支持可靠会话的指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" /> of type <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" /> initialized from the <paramref name="context" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener`1" /> 类型的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" />（从 <paramref name="context" /> 中初始化）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel> accepted by the listener is of type `TChannel`.
trans-unit.target: 侦听器所接受的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel> 具有 `TChannel` 类型。

trans-unit.source: The types of `TChannel` supported on the server that hosts the service is dependent of the types of underlying channels used to connect to the client.
trans-unit.target: 承载服务的服务器上所支持的 `TChannel` 类型取决于连接到客户端时所使用的基础通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The following table indicates what reliable session channel types are supported as a function of the underlying channels.
trans-unit.target: 下表指出支持何种可靠会话通道类型作为基础通道的一项功能。

trans-unit.source: Support for Reliable Session `TChannel` Types by Underlying Channel Types
trans-unit.target: 基础通道类型支持可靠会话 `TChannel` 类型

trans-unit.source: IReplyChannel
trans-unit.target: IReplyChannel

trans-unit.source: IReplySessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IReplySessionChannel

trans-unit.source: IDuplexChannel
trans-unit.target: IDuplexChannel

trans-unit.source: IDuplexSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IDuplexSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: IInputSessionChannel
trans-unit.target: IInputSessionChannel

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: Yes
trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.target: IReplySessionChannel

trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.target: 是

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="TChannel" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持 <paramref name="TChannel" />。

trans-unit.source: The type of channel the factory builds.
trans-unit.target: 工厂生成的通道类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> that contains the information required to build the factories that can produce channels of type <c>TChannel</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />，包含生成工厂所需的信息，这些工厂可生成类型为 <c>TChannel</c> 的通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the channel factory can be built for the channel and context provided that can support a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以为能够支持可靠会话的通道和所提供的上下文生成通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" /> of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> can be built; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可生成类型为 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1" />，则为 <paramref name="TChannel" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` or `false` for a `TChannel` in accordance with the table of values provided in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.BuildChannelFactory%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会根据 `true` 中提供的值列表，对 `false` 返回 `TChannel` 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.BuildChannelFactory%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" /> that the channel listener, if build, accepts.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" /> ，通道侦听器，如果生成，接受。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> that contains the information required to build the listeners that can accept channels of type <c>TChannel</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />，包含生成侦听器所需的信息，这些侦听器可接受类型为 <c>TChannel</c> 的通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the channel listener can be built for the channel and context provided that can support a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示是否可以为能够支持可靠会话的通道和所提供的上下文生成通道侦听器。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase`1" /> that can produce an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" /> of type <paramref name="TChannel" /> can be built by the binding element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果绑定元素可以生成能产生类型为 <see langword="true" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelListenerBase`1" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel" />，则为 <paramref name="TChannel" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Channel stacks are typically created using a factory pattern where a binding creates the channel stack.
trans-unit.target: 通道堆栈通常是使用工厂模式创建的，在这种模式中，绑定创建通道堆栈。

trans-unit.source: When sending messages, a binding is used to build a channel factory which in turn builds a channel stack and returns a reference to the top channel in the stack.
trans-unit.target: 发送消息时，使用绑定可生成通道工厂，而通道工厂可创建通道堆栈，并返回对堆栈中顶部通道的引用。

trans-unit.source: The application can then use this channel to send messages.
trans-unit.target: 之后，应用程序可以使用此通道发送消息。

trans-unit.source: Similarly when receiving messages, a binding is used to build a channel listener which listens for incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: 同样在接收消息时，使用绑定可生成通道侦听器，用于侦听传入消息。

trans-unit.source: The channel listener provides messages to the listening application by creating channel stacks and handing the application a reference to the top channel.
trans-unit.target: 通道侦听器会通过创建通道堆栈并向应用程序传递对顶部通道的引用，将消息提供给侦听应用程序。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` or `false` for a `TChannel` in accordance with the table of values provided in <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.BuildChannelListener%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会根据 `true` 中提供的值列表，对 `false` 返回 `TChannel` 或 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.BuildChannelListener%60%601%28System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext%29>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current reliable session binding element.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前可靠会话绑定元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" /> that is a clone of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement" />，它是当前绑定元素的克隆。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the reliable session has flow control enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示可靠会话是否已启用流控制。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the reliable session has flow control enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可靠会话已启用流控制，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Flow control is a mechanism that reliable sessions implement to ensure that senders do not send more messages than a receiver can handle.
trans-unit.target: 流控制是可靠会话实现的一种机制，目的是确保发送方所发送的消息数不超过接收方可处理的消息数。

trans-unit.source: Receivers have a buffer of messages that is used to accommodate message bursts and out-of-order messages.
trans-unit.target: 接收方拥有消息缓冲区，用于容纳突增的消息和无序的消息。

trans-unit.source: Receivers advertise to senders the amount of space that remains in this buffer in each of their acknowledgements.
trans-unit.target: 接收方在每次确认时都会告知发送方此缓冲区中的剩余空间量。

trans-unit.source: Senders can use this information to stop sending new messages whenever the receiver has no buffer space left.
trans-unit.target: 利用此信息，发送方就可以在接收方缓冲区中没有剩余空间时，停止发送新的消息。

trans-unit.source: The type of property retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 已检索的属性类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" /> that contains the information required to retrieve the channel of type <c>T</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext" />，包含检索 <c>T</c> 类型通道时所需的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets a property of the specified type from its binding context.
trans-unit.target: 从绑定上下文获取指定类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: The property of type <paramref name="T" /> with the specified <paramref name="context" /> or <see langword="null" /> if no property of type <paramref name="T" /> is found.
trans-unit.target: 类型为 <paramref name="T" /> 且具有指定 <paramref name="context" /> 的属性，如果找不到类型为 <see langword="null" /> 的属性，则为 <paramref name="T" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an interval of time that a service remains inactive before closing.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置服务在关闭之前保持非活动状态的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> that specifies the interval of time that a service remains inactive before closing.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />，指定服务在关闭之前保持非活动状态的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 10 minutes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 10 分钟。

trans-unit.source: Activity on a channel is defined as receiving an application or infrastructure message.
trans-unit.target: 通道上的活动被定义为接收应用程序或基础结构消息。

trans-unit.source: The inactivity timeout parameter controls the maximum amount of time to keep an inactive session alive.
trans-unit.target: 非活动超时参数会控制保持非活动会话存在的最长时间。

trans-unit.source: If more than <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.InactivityTimeout%2A> time interval passes with no activity, the session is aborted by the infrastructure and the channel faults.
trans-unit.target: 如果超过 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.InactivityTimeout%2A> 时间间隔后仍没有活动，则基础结构会中止会话，且通道会出错。

trans-unit.source: The reliable session is torn down unilaterally.
trans-unit.target: 可靠会话会遭到单方面撤销。

trans-unit.source: If the sending application has no messages to send then the reliable session is normally not faulted because of inactivity; instead a keep-alive mechanism keeps the session active indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 如果发送应用程序没有要发送的消息，则可靠会话通常不会因处于非活动状态而出错，“保持活动状态”机制会让会话无限期地处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Note that the dispatcher can independently abort the reliable session if no application messages are sent or received.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果未发送或接收任何应用程序消息，则调度程序可以单独中止可靠会话。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the inactivity timeout typically expires if network conditions are such that no messages are received or if there is a failure on the sender.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果网络状况为未收到任何消息或发送方失败，则非活动超时通常会过期。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than or equal to zero or greater than either <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> or <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于或等于零，或者大于 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the largest number of channels that can be pending during the reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在可靠会话期间可为挂起状态的最大通道数。

trans-unit.source: The largest number of channels that can be pending.
trans-unit.target: 可为挂起状态的最大通道数。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 4.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 4。

trans-unit.source: Channels are pending when they are waiting to be accepted.
trans-unit.target: 通道在等待被接受时处于挂起状态。

trans-unit.source: Once that limit is reached, no channels are created and put in pending mode until this number goes down (by accepting pending channels).
trans-unit.target: 一旦达到该限制，就不会创建任何通道并将其置于挂起模式，直到此数值降低（通过接受挂起的通道）。

trans-unit.source: This is a limit for each listener.
trans-unit.target: 这是对每个侦听器的限制。

trans-unit.source: When the threshold is reached and a remote application tries to establish a new reliable session, the request is denied and the open operation that prompted this faults.
trans-unit.target: 当达到此阈值时如果远程应用程序尝试建立新的可靠会话，则会拒绝请求且打开操作将提示此错误。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than or equal to zero or greater than 16384.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于或等于零，或者大于 16384。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of times that a message attempts to be transferred during the reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在可靠会话期间尝试传输消息的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of times that a message attempts to be re-sent.
trans-unit.target: 尝试重新发送消息的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value is 1; the maximum is <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />; and the default value is 8.
trans-unit.target: 最小值为 1；最大值为 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />；默认值为 8。

trans-unit.source: A message is considered to be transferred if its delivery at the recipient has been acknowledged by the recipient.
trans-unit.target: 如果接收方在接收时确认了消息的传递，则认为该消息已传输。

trans-unit.source: If an acknowledgment has not been received within a certain amount of time for a message that has been transmitted, the infrastructure automatically retransmits the message.
trans-unit.target: 如果在传输消息后的一段确定时间内未收到确认，则基础结构将自动重新传输该消息。

trans-unit.source: The infrastructure tries to send the message for, at most, a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.MaxRetryCount%2A> number of times.
trans-unit.target: 基础结构尝试发送消息的次数最多为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.MaxRetryCount%2A> 次。

trans-unit.source: Not receiving an acknowledgment before this limit is reached is considered a fatal communication failure and causes the channel faulted event to be raised.
trans-unit.target: 在达到此限制之前未接收到确认被视为严重的通信故障，这种情况将引发通道出错的事件。

trans-unit.source: The infrastructure uses an exponential back-off algorithm to determine when to retransmit, based on a computed average round-trip time.
trans-unit.target: 基础结构使用指数补偿算法根据计算的平均往返时间来确定何时重新传输。

trans-unit.source: The initial retry time is computed based on the measured roundtrip time of establishing the session.
trans-unit.target: 初始重试时间是根据测量的创建会话往返时间来计算的。

trans-unit.source: The retransmission algorithm doubles the delay with every attempt, which results in approximately 8.5 minutes passing between the first transmission attempt and the last retransmission attempt.
trans-unit.target: 重新传输算法是每进行一次尝试，延迟时间就会增加一倍。如此一来，从第一次传输尝试到最后一次传输尝试大约会历时 8.5 分钟。

trans-unit.source: The time for the first retransmission attempt is adjusted according to the calculated round-trip time and the resulting stretch of time that those attempts take varies accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 可以根据计算的往返时间来调整第一次尝试重新传输的时间，因此这些尝试所经历的时间将会相应地发生变化。

trans-unit.source: This allows the retransmission time to dynamically adapt to varying network conditions.
trans-unit.target: 这样，可以使重新传输时间动态地适应不断变化的网络条件。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than or equal to zero.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于或等于零。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the largest number of messages that can exist in either the send buffer or the receive buffer.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在发送缓冲区或接收缓冲区中可存在的最大消息数。

trans-unit.source: The largest number of messages that can be buffered.
trans-unit.target: 可进行缓冲处理的最大消息数。

trans-unit.source: The minimum value is 1; the maximum value is 4096; and the default value is 32.
trans-unit.target: 最小值为 1；最大值为 4096；默认值为 32。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.MaxTransferWindowSize%2A> property can be set on both the sender and the receiver.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement.MaxTransferWindowSize%2A> 属性的值可在发送方和接收方进行设置。

trans-unit.source: This value is included in the binding policy of the WSDL, so if you use the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) to construct your client, it has the same value.
trans-unit.target: 此值内含在 WSDL 绑定策略中因此，如果你使用[ServiceModel 元数据实用工具 (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)要构建你的客户端，它具有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this value is whatever you set it to be on the client.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此值就是在客户端上设置的任何值。

trans-unit.source: When this limit is reached on the sender, additional calls to send are blocked.
trans-unit.target: 如果达到发送方的这个限制，则会阻止其他发送调用。

trans-unit.source: When this limit is reached on the receiver, new messages that arrive on the underlying channel are not accepted.
trans-unit.target: 如果达到接收方的这个限制，则不会接受到达基础通道的新消息。

trans-unit.source: A reliable session uses a windowing protocol to help improve network utilization.
trans-unit.target: 可靠会话会使用窗口协议来帮助提高网络利用率。

trans-unit.source: The amount of buffering required is directly derived from the size of the transmission window.
trans-unit.target: 所需的缓冲量直接从传输窗口的大小派生而来。

trans-unit.source: When tuning this value, note that the optimal transmission window is related to the bandwidth and the latency in a straight-forward way.
trans-unit.target: 调整此值时请注意，最佳传输窗口直接与带宽和延迟相关。

trans-unit.source: The ideal maximum window size is the bandwidth times the latency.
trans-unit.target: 理想的最大窗口大小是带宽乘以延迟。

trans-unit.source: Anything smaller yields less than 100% network utilization; anything larger is just wasted space.
trans-unit.target: 如果比此值小，网络利用率就会低于 100%，如果比此值大，就会浪费空间。

trans-unit.source: The value set is less than or equal to one or greater than 4096.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值小于或等于 1，或者大于 4096。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether message delivery must preserve the order in which messages are sent.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示消息传递是否必须保持与消息发送一致的顺序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if messages must be delivered in the order in which they are sent; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果消息必须按照发送时的顺序传递，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: To get messages dispatched in order, you also must set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode.Single>.
trans-unit.target: 若要按顺序调度消息，还必须将 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode> 设置为 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ConcurrencyMode.Single>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of WS-ReliableMessaging specified by the binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置绑定元素指定的 WS-ReliableMessaging 版本。

trans-unit.source: An instance derived from <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion" /> that represents the version of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol used by the configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 一个派生自 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ReliableMessagingVersion" /> 的实例，表示配置元素所使用的 WS-ReliableMessaging 协议的版本。

trans-unit.source: There are currently two versions of the WS-ReliableMessaging protocol supported by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)]: WS-ReliableMessaging1.1 and WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005.
trans-unit.target: 目前，[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 支持两个版本的 WS-ReliableMessaging 协议：WS-ReliableMessaging1.1 和 WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005。

trans-unit.source: The default version is WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005.
trans-unit.target: 默认版本为 WS-ReliableMessagingFebruary2005。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter" /> that exports the binding information in the reliable session binding element to the WSDL elements.
trans-unit.target: 将可靠会话绑定元素中的绑定信息导出到 WSDL 元素的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> that provides the mapping from exported WSDL elements to the endpoint description.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" />，提供从导出的 WSDL 元素到终结点说明的映射。

trans-unit.source: Maps the information contained in the reliable session binding element into the WSDL elements that enable a remote endpoint to access the service with a reliable session.
trans-unit.target: 将可靠会话绑定元素包含的信息，映射到可启用远程终结点以通过可靠会话访问服务的 WSDL 元素。
